Flag to read non modifiable data from the card
Flag to read modifiable data from the card

member.summary: Provides methods required to initialize the Toolkit and get the connected smartcard readers

member.name: M:AE.EmiratesId.IdCard.Toolkit.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Toolkit constructor initializes the Toolkit context and prepares the SDK for use
member.param: If this flag is true, the Toolkit will fulfill the API/Service requests within the library itself. If the flag is false then the Toolkit shared library in the application process will forward the API/Service requests to Toolkit Agent running in the same system where the application is running
Application specific configuration parameters
member.exception: In case of error, the function throws ToolkitException
